label: AlphaFoldV2
description: AlphaFold predicts a protein's 3D structure from its amino acid sequence using deep learning

parameters.label: FASTA Paths
parameters.desc: FASTA file containing protein sequence(s) to predict

parameters.label: Database Preset
parameters.desc: Choose database configuration for MSA generation

parameters.label: Max Template Date
parameters.desc: Latest template release date to consider (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.label: UniRef90 Database Path
parameters.desc: Path to UniRef90 database for MSA generation

parameters.label: MGnify Database Path
parameters.desc: Path to MGnify database for MSA generation

parameters.label: BFD Database Path
parameters.desc: Path to BFD (Big Fantastic Database) for MSA generation

parameters.label: UniRef30 Database Path
parameters.desc: Path to UniRef30 database for template search

parameters.label: PDB70 Database Path
parameters.desc: Path to PDB70 database for template search

parameters.label: Template mmCIF Directory
parameters.desc: Path to directory containing PDB mmCIF template files

parameters.label: Obsolete PDBs Path
parameters.desc: Path to file listing obsolete PDB entries
